channel.title: New facebook style options
channel.description:
im not sure what these are cause ive asked around and most people say they dont have this? does anyone know what it is
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2w7319c.png[/img]
mind the odd black bars and distorts
edit: fixed image again

item.title: New facebook style options
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:10, topic:405011”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=502021.msg3672903#msg3672903 date=1311048953]
That looks stupid as Hell… -.- Facebook needs to start doing something to actually improve the website.
[/quote]
Finally someone else agree’s with me, Its been 6 months since facebook android came out and I still can’t delete my own wall posts…[/quote]

do u also have dislikes/trouble with their fb chat part of their app? to me their fb chat part is a joke. the messaging is inconstistant unless u stay looking at the converasion also the only notification they give u when some one messages u is a pop up in the notification bar no vibrate nor sound…

Read full topic

item.title: New facebook style options
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:10, topic:405011”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=502021.msg3672903#msg3672903 date=1311048953]
That looks stupid as Hell… -.- Facebook needs to start doing something to actually improve the website.
[/quote]
Finally someone else agree’s with me, Its been 6 months since facebook android came out and I still can’t delete my own wall posts…[/quote]
I just now noticed that, with the Android I have, I can’t freaking delete wall posts and what not… wow.

Read full topic

item.title: New facebook style options
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“Jerico Pimpinbro, post:5, topic:405011”][quote author=gnomez link=topic=502021.msg3672826#msg3672826 date=1311046223]

I see you have less than 40 friends…

no i dont add people anymore thats just a account to play the crappy farm games
[/quote]

The only time I add people is when they add me and I still maintain nearly 300 friends.[/quote]
facebook is just something i use to play games i use msn for freinds and family.
its a site that encourages people to bug the living hell out of you with pokes and game requests so i dont add people unless they are family and i dont have alot of family members that use the internet

Read full topic
